suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/data8_datacapturevalidation.description: Adds postcode lookup functionality for UK addresses to all address entry screens, telephone validation for UK and US telephone numbers and international email address validation.
